item.title: Snitch add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "So, this is my life. And I want you to know that I am both happy and sad and I'm still trying to figure out how that could be." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Snitch add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Snitch add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "It's just that I don't want to be somebody's crush. If somebody likes me, I want them to like the real me, not what they think I am. And I don't want them to carry it around inside. I want them to show me, so I can feel it too." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Snitch add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "All the books we own, both read and unread, are the fullest expression of self we have at our disposal. ... But with each passing year, and with each whimsical purchase, our libraries become more and more able to articulate who we are, whether we read the books or not." -- Nick Hornby
